title: Bug 108975  Visibility Toggle -  Chart Interactivity BPS 37
description: This is a point feature of BPS37 (http://www.eclipse.org/birt/wiki/index.php? n=BPS.BPS37)  This feature covers the ability to toggle the visibility of chart elements.      The SVG, SWT and Swing renderer should support this feature.  The following is a use case. A line chart consisting of two datasets is displayed in an html page using the  SVG renderer. The user has the ability to select a legend item to toggle the  visibility of the associated dataset in the plot area.
